1.9.4.1.0.0-Alpha+06-25-00-29:
Added player hunter leveling between 2 and 5
Added several hunter skills including blood potions and weapon tables
Added crossbows as hunter wepons
Bugfixes

1.9.1.0.0-Alpha+05-15-12-31:
Made disguise ability actually work
Small fixes

Alpha+05-14-18-02 Changes:
Villages are now protected by vampire hunters
Villagers can be converted to vampire villagers who hide from the sun, offer special trades and suck blood from other villagers.
If to many villagers are bitten in a short amount of time the village turn aggressive and some villagers will equip their pitchfork and start hunting vampires in their village.
1.9.1.0.0-Alpha+04-21-19-48:
Added advanced hunters and advanced vampire.
Added hunter camps with a camp fire.
Updated some textures and models.
Minor additions.
1.9.1.0.0-Alpha+04-18-23-18: Implemented blood vision and made night vision toggleable
